full_summary:
## Request for Proposal: Lettering of T-Shirts and Caps

### Request Reference Number
- Reference Number: `cb-7504-55642060`
- Amendment Number: `2`
- Solicitation Number: `M5000-23-0876/B`

### Request Overview
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP), Depot Division is seeking a supplier to provide lettering services for T-shirts and caps. The tender involves approximately 40 to 45 troops per year, with an additional 2 to 5 special groups.

### Tender Criteria
- **Evaluation Method**: The lowest price bid evaluated per item will be recommended for contract award.
- **Bid Requirements**: Bids must comply with all requirements outlined in the bid solicitation to be considered responsive.
- **Submission Instructions**: Bids must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit as per the Request for Proposal (RFP) instructions.

### Additional Information

- The Integrity Regime is administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada and will be applied in this solicitation.
- Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
- Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
- The Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) is an online resource for identifying Indigenous business capacity. Registered businesses in the IBD may be considered eligible for federal government contracts set aside for Indigenous businesses.

### Tender Documents
The full tender documents are available for download via the Government Electronic Tendering Service (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities). It is the bidder's responsibility to regularly consult this website for the most up-to-date information.

### Tender Contact
- **Name**: Qyitayo Ziwa
- **Email**: Qyitayo.ziwa@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
- **Phone**: (639) 625-4151

### Tender Closing Date
The tender closing date is **2023-08-23T16:00:00**.

Please note that amendments to this solicitation will be posted on the Government Electronic Tendering Service. it is the bidder's responsibility to regularly consult this website for the most up-to-date information.
